metadata.title: CVE-2018-20019 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
LibVNC before commit a83439b9fbe0f03c48eb94ed05729cb016f8b72f containsmultiple heap out-of-bound write vulnerabilities in VNC client code thatcan result remote code execution

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1.2
libvncserver-config - 0.9.11+dfsg-1.2
libvncserver1 - 0.9.11+dfsg-1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.11+dfsg-1.2').
